metadata.title: CVE-2016-10505 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: NULL pointer dereference vulnerabilities in the imagetopnm function inconvert.c, sycc444_to_rgb function in color.c, color_esycc_to_rgb functionin color.c, and sycc422_to_rgb function in color.c in OpenJPEG before 2.2.0allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) viacrafted j2k files.

criterions.comment: openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
